summary: This Erases all effect of Gravity on all arrows.
descriptionHtml:
This bothered me alot, i could never figure out how people got all those trick shots from like 20 miles away. So it just became easier to shoot them without gravity effects on arrows.
Works on all Skyrim arrows, Dawnguard arrows and Dragonborn arrows. 
Will do Bolts probably tomorrow.

Requirments: 
Latest Skyrim update, Dawnguard, and Dragonborn.

Installation:
Either drag and drop, or NMM

Uninstall:
Same process.

If you do like, please endorse, i understand alot of people also have problems with this.
author: Manuel3593
